translations.translation: From a drop of sperm He created him and proportioned h
From a single sperm He created, then proportioned him,
Out of a sperm-drop did He create him and then determined a measure for him,
He created him from a living germ. He determined his fate
From a drop of liquid; He created him and then set several measures for him.
From a Nutfah He created him and then set him in due proportion.
Of a small seed; He created him, then He made him according to a measure,
Of a sperm-drop He created him, and determined him,
From a drop of seed. He createth him and proportioneth him,
Out of a drop of sperm! He creates and proportions him,
Of a drop of seed. He created him and formed him according to a measure.
He created him from a drop of [seminal] fluid; then proportioned him.
From a sperm-drop: He hath created him, and then mouldeth him in due proportions;
From Nutfah (male and female semen drops) He created him, and then set him in due proportion;
From a (sperm) drop He created him and then determined him,
From a sperm drop He created him, and enabled him.
From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;
[80:19] From a drop of sperm did He create him then proportion him, [in stages] as a blood-clot, then an embryo up to the last [stage] of his creation.

Allah then explained and said to him: (From a drop of seed. He createth him) a living being (and proportioneth him) He proportioned his creation by giving him two hands, two feet, two eyes, two ears as well as all the other organs,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ } مهينة خبيثة { خَلَقَهُ فَقَدَّرَهُ } [عبس: 19] أي: هيَّأ آلاته وأعضاءه منها
 فعدَّله وسوَّى هيكله
 ومن أنَّى تكبر وافتخر وبطر؟!

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { ما أكْفَرَه } ، ما أشد كفره! تعجبٌ من إفراطه في الكفران، وبيانٌ لاستحقاقه الدعاء عليه، وقيل: " ما " استفهامية، توبيخي، أي: أيُّ شيء حَمَلَه على الكفر؟! { من أي شيءٍ خَلَقهُ } أي: من أيِّ شيءٍ حقيرٍ خلَقَه؟ ثم بيّنه بقوله: { من نطفةٍ خَلَقَه } أي: مِن نطفة مذرة ابتداء خلقه، { فقدَّره } فهيّأه لِما يصلح له، ويليق به من الأعضاء والأشكال، أو: فقدّره أطوراً إلى أن تَم خلقه
